page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: THE LOCATION OF THIS BLOCK IS IN THE NORTH WEST CORNER OF HAMPSHIRE,SITUATED ON MAINLY CHALKY DOWNLAND,4 MILES SOUTH OF ANDOVER AND 8 MILES NORTH OF WINCHESTER. THE AREA IS PREDOMINATELY A FARMING COMMUNITY CONTAINING 2 LARGE VILLAGES AND ONE SMALL VILLAGE WHICH OCCUPY THE RIVER VALLEYS OF THE TEST AND THE ANTON. THE FARMING INDUSTRY INCLUDES CROPS, DAIRY,POULTRY AND FISH FARMING.THE LAND IS OWNED EITHER BY PRIVATE ESTATES OR CONSORTIUMS. HOUSING IS OCCUPIED BY TENANT FARM WORKERS AND INCOMING PROFESSIONAL FAMILIES WHICH PROVIDE CERTAIN MOBILITY IN THE COMMUNITY.THE COMMUNITY IN BOTH VILLAGES IS THRIVING. THE BEAUTY OF THE COUNTRYSIDE AND THE PICTURESQUE THATCHED COTTAGES ATTRACT RAMBLERS AND TOURISTS.
